narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this re-license inspection of site 004. 
 
This is the 1st re-license inspection for a Class A license at this site. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with 
the facility representative. This site is ready to be licensed under the AWA. 
 
A copy of your license will be sent to you without any additional action on your part once all sites have passed a re-license 
inspection. If you have not received your license within 30 days, please contact the USDA at (970) 494-7478. 
 
Note: Facility cannot conduct regulated activity until new license is issued. 
 
End Section
